FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
======

**I don't see Windows on your template or ISO list. Is it available?**
-------
We offer a separate lineup for Window VPSes.  Our 50% off for life promotion also applies to our Windows lineup, <a href="https://www.stablebox.com/windows-ssd-cloud-vps-hosting/">click here</a> for more information.

**Why is Windows slightly more expensive?**
------
The main factor is licensing costs - rather than spreading out the licensing costs to everyone, whether they choose Windows or another operating system (which would be a bit unfair!), we only factor the cost into our Windows lineup. This helps us keep prices low for everyone.

**Do you allow game servers?**
-------
Game servers are typically extremely CPU-intensive. Therefore, we do not allow game servers to be hosted on our Stablebox VPS’s. We do, however, offer game servers and VPSes specifically tailored for game server hosting via our gaming division, <a href="https://www.purepings.com">PurePings</a>.

**Do you allow adult content?**
-------
Yes, we allow adult content as long as it is legal under United States law.

ABOUT US
=======

About the Stablebox Division
-------
Hypernia Corporation ([https://www.hypernia.com](https://www.hypernia.com)) launched the Stablebox brand in early 2012 to specialize in providing enterprise class web hosting, cloud servers and dedicated servers to meet the ever growing needs of both individuals and businesses alike.

Stablebox has grown tremendously since its inception and has quickly become a leader in the web hosting industry. Today StableBox has been chosen by thousands of web site owners, designers and small businesses as their service provider of choice when it comes their web hosting needs.

All Stablebox services are backed by our technical support; 100% available, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year. The Stablebox network operations center (NOC) is staffed at all times with talented, professional engineers to assist with all of your needs.

In addition to Plesk powered web hosting and KVM-based VPS hosting, Stablebox offers 100% managed cloud servers and dedicated servers to alleviate the requirement for our clients to have costly in house system admins or the burden of locating a reliable system admin contractor.

About Hypernia Corporation
-------
Founded in 2001, Hypernia Corporation pioneered the Internet data center market with innovative service offerings that would help businesses and individuals take advantage of the speed and global reach of technology and the Internet.

Hypernia believes that for organizations to be successful, they need a partner that provides flexible and affordable solutions that spark independence and confidence in their online business.

Hypernia established its high volume network for intense application hosting such as online gaming in 2002, and continues to be a leading provider of complex Internet hosting for enterprises with mission-critical Internet operations.
